messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2976
messages.msgSnippet: ... I know some will disagree, but I couldn t live with myself unless I spoke up: This was the Worst Movie Ever. It was so boring that Craig and I fast
messages.messageBody:
>From: Paula Sjogerman <sjogy@...>

> > 1999: Eyes Wide Shut

I know some will disagree, but I couldn't live with myself unless I spoke
up: This was the Worst Movie Ever. It was so boring that Craig and I fast
forwarded, trying to find anything slightly titillating.>>


LOL!!! I forced myself to watch this movie because I couldn't believe after
all the hype, it could be as bad as I thought it was!! Unfortunately I was
watching on cable and couldn't FF. It was absolutely awful.

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2976
messages.msgSnippet: on 1/31/03 10:10 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... I know some will disagree, but I couldn t live with myself unless I spoke up: This was the Worst
messages.messageBody:
on 1/31/03 10:10 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> 1999: Eyes Wide Shut

I know some will disagree, but I couldn't live with myself unless I spoke
up: This was the Worst Movie Ever. It was so boring that Craig and I fast
forwarded, trying to find anything slightly titillating.

Paula
